items.name: var CMErrorDeviceRequiresMovement: CMError
items.desc: The device must move for a sampling of motion data to occur.

items.name: var CMErrorMotionActivityNotAuthorized: CMError
items.desc: The app isn’t currently authorized to use motion activity support.

items.name: var CMErrorMotionActivityNotAvailable: CMError
items.desc: Motion activity support isn’t available on the current device.

items.name: var CMErrorMotionActivityNotEntitled: CMError
items.desc: The app is missing an entitlement for the requested activity.

items.name: var CMErrorNilData: CMError
items.desc: Core Motion didn’t return any data.

items.name: var CMErrorNotAuthorized: CMError
items.desc: The app isn’t authorized to use the Core Motion framework.

items.name: var CMErrorNotAvailable: CMError
items.desc: The requested service isn’t available on this device.

items.name: var CMErrorNotEntitled: CMError
items.desc: The app is missing a required entitlement.

items.name: var CMErrorSize: CMError
items.desc: The data is the incorrect size.

items.name: var CMErrorTrueNorthNotAvailable: CMError
items.desc: True north isn’t available on this device.
